markdownRemark.html:
We don’t choose our birth parents. Most people haven’t reflected on the fact that being born to this world is not of our own choosing. Gary Vaynerchuck’s quote for the odds of being a human is 400 trillion to one. Okay, religious people will credit a “creator” but I hate to break it because there is no God or Allah or even Buddah. I hope I can capture my deep understanding of evolution and how I made sense of it in this blog post.

I was born to a poor family in San Ildefonso, a town 2 hours from Manila, our nation’s Capital in 1985. For the most part of my childhood, I am serving the local church as an altar boy..even got medals for it. All of my friends did the same. My whole family did too. I was so proud in serving at weekly evening saturday mass.

If I were to have a hand in my fate as to where I should start this life of sacrifice and struggle I wouldn’t choose a developing country hampered by corruption and social turmoil.
